meanings: bear, (참다) endure tolerate, put up with; (주로 부정문·의문문에 쓰여) stand

vlive.korean: '무게를 견디는자...' "The one who withstands the weight..." 듣기 View video VICTON : 다글 모하나아?!
'무게를 견디는 자 왕관을 쓰라'인가? "Those who hold onto weight, wear a crown?" 듣기 View video VICTON : 연결아 ㅠㅠ
vlive.english: "Those who hold onto weight, wear a crown?"

vlive.korean: 활동을 잠깐 쉬는 것을 못 견디는 분들이... Some said they can't tolerate the period of taking a break from work. 듣기 View video JTBC PLUS : BTS의 RM부터 EXID 솔지까지! 건강하게 돌아와 준 고마운 스타들☆
vlive.english: Some said they can't tolerate the period of taking a break from work.

vlive.korean: 졸음을 견디는 방법. Ways to endure sleep. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST W] 뉴블의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.4
견디는 게 쉽지 않은 일인 것 같아요. It would be hard to endure. 듣기 View video V BOOKS : <송곳> 최규석 작가 북토크 생중계 (게스트 : 주호민, 이종범)
vlive.english: It would be hard to endure.

examples.korean: a new strain of mosquitoes resistant to the poison 발음듣기 그 독성 물질에 견디는 새로운 종류의 모기 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a new strain of mosquitoes resistant to the poison 발음

examples.korean: Paint the shed with weather-resistant paint. 발음듣기 헛간에는 비바람에 잘 견디는 페인트를 칠하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Paint the shed with weather-resistant paint. 발음

examples.korean: I didn’t have enough clothes to last a week. 발음듣기 나는 일주일을 견디는 데 필요한 옷을 갖고 있지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I didn’t have enough clothes to last a week. 발음

examples.korean: Cacti are characterized by their hardiness even in dry[arid] climates. 발음듣기 선인장은 건조한 기후에도 잘 견디는 특성이 있다 Neungyule
examples.english: Cacti are characterized by their hardiness even in dry[arid] climates. 발음

examples.korean: I like whatever is durable. 발음듣기 나는 무엇이든 오래 견디는 것을 좋아한다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I like whatever is durable. 발음
